Li-Ming.name: Magic Missiles
Li-Ming.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

Li-Ming.name: Arcane Orb
Li-Ming.description: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. The amount of damage dealt is increased the further it travels, up to 405 (+3% per level) damage.

Li-Ming.name: Disintegrate
Li-Ming.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

Li-Ming.name: Wave Of Force
Li-Ming.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

Li-Ming.name: Critical Mass
Li-Ming.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of your Abilities.

1.name: Aether Walker
1.description: If you haven't taken damage in the last 5 seconds, Teleport costs no mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

1.name: Astral Presence
1.description: Your Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

1.name: Force Armor
1.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast. Stores up to 4 charges.

1.name: Power Hungry
1.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Ability Power for 20 seconds.

4.name: Charged Blast
4.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Dominance
4.description: Takedowns restore 20% of your maximum Health.

4.name: Triumvirate
4.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

7.name: Calamity
7.description: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near your destination.

7.name: Seeker
7.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Zei's Vengeance
7.description: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

10.name: Disintegrate
10.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

10.name: Wave Of Force
10.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Cannoneer
13.description: When you use an Ability, increase your next Basic Attack by 75% and cause it to deal Ability damage.  Stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Glass Cannon
13.description: Increases your Ability Power by 15%, but decreases your maximum Health by 15%.

13.name: Illusionist
13.description: Increases Teleport range by 50%, and if you lose more than 20% of your Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed. This cannot happen more than once every 4 seconds.

16.name: Arcane Orbit
16.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage.

16.name: Diamond Skin
16.description: When you Teleport, gain 20% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 4 seconds.

16.name: Fireflies
16.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

16.name: Mirrorball
16.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

20.name: Archon: Pure Power
20.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing you to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

20.name: Repulsion
20.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
20.description: Using Abilities grants 5% Ability Power, to a maximum of 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

20.name: Temporal Flux
20.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.
